song.title: Messiah
song.info:
Malekith presents :
MESSIAH
Second contribution to Tracked Aggression IV
It's something quite different from my other originals... hope you like this one.
Samples by Betrayer and Cadaver. Greets to them, Friz, Gorjr, Hakan, Dragon, Tarantula, Galahad and all metal trackers i can have forgotten.
If you have anything to say, email me at jcgendre@email.impulsor.fr
See you !
lyrics : (length : 6'39)
You think you're to rule over mankind People should kneel each time they see you You own all their bodies and their minds Because you are a new Messiah
Then you go and preach your own gospel Made of hypocrisy and lies Men are to do everything you tell All those who're destroyed and mesmerised
You say, they do You're man, them too But you're special
You fight, they hate You hold their fate Under control [CHORUS]
And for them there's nothing but you Messiah
You consider you are a holy being Their God, their Devil, you own their souls Don't you realize that you're nothing You've fallen under Satan's control
[repeat]
And for them there's nothing but you Messiah
[solo + repeat]
You act the way the devils do You have them pawns, but you're one too And I am not afraid of you
Until the day I defeat you Messiah
